get.description: List all spark batch jobs which are running under a particular spark pool.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Optional param specifying which index the list should begin from.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description:
Optional param specifying the size of the returned list.
            By default it is 20 and that is the maximum.

parameters.name: detailed
parameters.description: Optional query param specifying whether detailed response is returned beyond plain livy.

parameters.name: detailed
parameters.description: Optional query param specifying whether detailed response is returned beyond plain livy.

parameters.name: sparkBatchJobOptions
parameters.description: Livy compatible batch job request payload.

get.description: Gets a single spark batch job.

parameters.name: batchId
parameters.description: Identifier for the batch job.

parameters.name: detailed
parameters.description: Optional query param specifying whether detailed response is returned beyond plain livy.

delete.description: Cancels a running spark batch job.

parameters.name: batchId
parameters.description: Identifier for the batch job.

get.description: List all spark sessions which are running under a particular spark pool.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Optional param specifying which index the list should begin from.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description:
Optional param specifying the size of the returned list.
            By default it is 20 and that is the maximum.

parameters.name: detailed
parameters.description: Optional query param specifying whether detailed response is returned beyond plain livy.

parameters.description: Optional query param specifying whether detailed response is returned beyond plain livy.

parameters.name: detailed

parameters.description: Identifier for the session.

put.description: Sends a keep alive call to the current session to reset the session timeout.

default.description: An error response received from the Azure Synapse service.

put.description: Creates or updates a Spark Job Definition.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Spark Job Definition entity.  Should only be specified for update, for which it should match existing entity or can be * for unconditional update.

parameters.name: sparkJobDefinition
parameters.description: Spark Job Definition resource definition.

default.description: An error response received from the Azure Synapse service.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Spark Job Definition entity. Should only be specified for get. If the ETag matches the existing entity tag, or if * was provided, then no content will be returned.

default.description: An error response received from the Azure Synapse service.

parameters.description: proposed new name.

parameters.name: sparkJobDefinitionAzureResource

default.description: An error response received from the Azure Synapse service.

SubResource.description: Azure Synapse nested resource, which belongs to a workspace.

CloudError.description: The object that defines the structure of an Azure Synapse error response.

CloudErrorBody.description: The object that defines the structure of an Azure Synapse error.

target.description: Property name/path in request associated with error.

SparkJobDefinitionsListResponse.description: A list of spark job definitions resources.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of results, if any remaining results exist.

from.description: The start index of fetched sessions.

appId.description: The application id of this session

notStartedAt.description: the time that at which "not_started" livy state was first seen.

startingAt.description: the time that at which "starting" livy state was first seen.

runningAt.description: the time that at which "running" livy state was first seen.

deadAt.description: time that at which "dead" livy state was first seen.

successAt.description: the time that at which "success" livy state was first seen.

killedAt.description: the time that at which "killed" livy state was first seen.

recoveringAt.description: the time that at which "recovering" livy state was first seen.

msg.description: The msg property from the Livy API. The value is always "canceled".

ArtifactRenameRequest.description: Request body structure for rename artifact.

Endpoint.name: endpoint
Endpoint.description: The workspace development endpoint, for example https://myworkspace.dev.azuresynapse.net.
